short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract loaded YouTube comment to JSON

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can extract loaded YouTube comment into JSON format file.

The extension is free to use. We'd appreciate it if you buy us a ☕️
(https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ytcommentextr) if you find the extension useful.
